Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Godfather:::

::A stasis pod landed by the Alliance base.  The scanners were damaged, so no 
alternate mode was created.  A tall and fat robot climed out.  He sees 
Deemos' group and walks up to them.  Seeing that Deemos looks like the 
leader, he addresses him::
Godfather: Yo dude.  You leader of this group?
::he says, looking at the rest of the Chosen Mafia.  he takes out his pistol::
Godfather: Now im gonna make you an offer you cannot refuse.  May i join ya?

--part1_cb.b308422.2741f66c_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR>::he says, looking at the rest of the Chosen Mafia.  he takes out his pistol::
